post.title: Panda 0.1.0-alpha
post.content:
Panda 0.1.0-alpha

We're happy to announce ðŸ“¢ the first official alpha release of Panda. Until this day we'll distribute user-friendly binaries to provide simple access and preview of development progress.

Goals for alpha releases:

  • detect various bugs
  • verify some concepts
  • improve performance issues (!)
  • simplify API for developers (!)

To download and install Panda, visit install page.
